title: Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641, Premium Hand Protection from Welder and Cutting Torch Heat, Commercial Quality, Cotton Lined, Gauntlet Cuff, Unisex, Grey, One Size
descriptions:
**Introducing the Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641: Uncompromising Protection for Your Hands**

Are you a professional welder or DIY enthusiast looking for gloves that can withstand the intense heat and sparks of your work? Look no further than the Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641. Designed with heavy-duty protection in mind, these premium gloves provide unparalleled hand protection from welding and cutting torch heat.

**Durable Construction**

Built with split cowhide grade A leather on the exterior and cotton fleece on the interior, these gloves offer a comfortable fit while maintaining their shape even after repeated use. The fully welted seams ensure that there are no weak points in the construction, making them resistant to abrasion and wear.

**Heat, Flame, and Chemical Resistance**

The Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641 feature heat-resistant, flame-resistant, and chemical-resistant materials that protect your hands from extreme temperatures and harsh chemicals. Whether you're working with MIG or stick welding, these gloves have got you covered.

**Winged Thumb Design for Enhanced Flexibility**

The winged thumb design allows for a natural range of motion, making it easy to manipulate tools and equipment without restriction. The Kevlar stitching material adds an extra layer of durability to the construction.

**Unisex Fit and Gauntlet Cuff**

These gloves are designed with unisex in mind, providing a comfortable fit for both men and women. The gauntlet cuff style reaches up to 13.5 inches, allowing you to wear them over your jacket or coat for added protection.

**Order Now and Experience the Best Hand Protection on the Market**

Don't compromise on hand safety any longer. Get the Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641 today and enjoy peace of mind knowing that your hands are protected from even the most intense welding applications. Order now and take advantage of our competitive pricing and fast shipping.
